QuestData.Title: In a Bind
QuestData.Description: $n, you must be cautious. Kaliva is still about and when she captured us, she specifically mentioned your name.$B$BOnly her heart can free us from these chains, but I think it's all a trap for you!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Foul demon dominatrix. Get her heart!
QuestData.CompletionText: If we are to be free, we must have Kaliva's heart.
QuestData.RewardText: Disgusting, I know, but if we three are to be free of Kaliva's chains, it is not enough that she is dead.$B$BWe must eat of her fel heart!
